1. One day,  
2. a small fish named Fin was swimming close to the shore.  
3. He spotted a large crab  
4. and wished to become friends.  
5. "Hello,  
6. I’m Fin.  
7. Would you like to play?" the little fish inquired.  
8. The crab glanced at Fin  
9. and replied,  
10. "No,  
11. I don't want to play.  
12. I’m feeling cold  
13. and not very well."  
14. Fin felt a pang of sadness  
15. but wished to assist the crab in feeling better.  
16. He swam away  
17. and devised a plan.  
18. He recalled  
19. that the sun could provide warmth.  
20. Therefore,  
21. Fin swam to the surface of the water  
22. and called out to the sun,  
23. "Please,  
24. sun,  
25. help my new friend feel better  
26. and prevent him from freezing!"  
27. The sun listened to Fin's plea  
28. and cast its warm light upon the shore.  
29. The crab began to feel improved  
30. and less chilly.  
31. Noticing Fin,  
32. he said,  
33. "Thank you,  
34. little fish,  
35. for helping me feel better.  
36. I no longer feel  
37. as though I will freeze.  
38. Let’s play together!"  
39. Thus,  
40. Fin  
41. and the crab played  
42. and became great friends.
